title: WHO certifies Cabo Verde as malaria-free; Read on to know more
description:
The World Health Organization (WHO) has certified Cabo Verde as a malaria-free country. With this announcement, Cabo Verde joins the ranks of 43 countries and 1 territory that WHO has awarded this certification.

Cabo Verde is the third country to be certified in the WHO African region, joining Maur...
